text: U ewan (filan) bi sonda xweyen zexm sond xwarine, heke ji bona wan ra berateke sodret hatibe, ewane idi bi we berate bawer bikin. (Muhemmed! Tu ji bona wan ra aha) beje: "Bi rasti berateyen sodreti li bal Yezdan in." Qey hun (geli bawergeran!) goman nakin heke gava ji bona wan ra ewan beratan hatibin ji disa ewan bawer nakin
